zhcn_desc:
§E§H消费品§!（£consumer_goods£）是高级资源，象征着可以提高£pop£§H人口§!的生活质量的科技产品和奢侈品，同时也是脑力劳动£job£§H职业§!诸如£job_researcher£ §H研究§!所不可或缺的资源。你可以通过以下的方式获取更多的消费品：
§Y1.§!在已殖民星球的地表建设 £building£ §H民用工业体§!建筑。
§Y2.§!在已殖民星球的地表建设 £district£ §H工业区划§!。
§Y3.§!在§H贸易市场§!购买。§!
en_desc:
§E§HConsumer Goods§! (£consumer_goods£) is an advanced resource that represents the various gadgets, luxuries and goods necessary to give your £pop£ §HPops§! a good life and to perform intellectual £job£ §HJobs§! such as £job_researcher£ §HResearch§!. You can gain more by:
§Y1.§! Building £building£ §HCivilian Industries§! buildings on the surface of colonized planets.
§Y2.§! Building £district£ §HIndustrial Districts§! on the surface of colonized planets.
§Y3.§! Buying more on the §HMarket§!.§!
